location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map illustrating air routes in Iran

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 330 x 202mmMaterials: Manuscript, pencil and ink on paper

mods.abstract: A sketch map showing Iran in the centre bounded by Iraq to the East, Afghanistan and Baluchistan to the West, the Caspian Sea in the North, and the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman in the South. The Tabriz-Tehran-Meshed air route is indicated by a dashed line. A number of surrounding cities in both Iran and neighbouring countries are also marked.The map bears the abbreviation ‘E&O’, short for Economic and Overseas Department, and is signed and dated 4 September 1944.
